page.title: 04POPULATIONS
page.content: The population of this area (some 300 households) forms a rich variety.Being such a pleasant, rural area many of the houses are bought as retirement homes or by people from the professional classes which gives a fairly high average age and something of an imbalance. These are the folks who can afford to maintain thatched roofs etc and give the properties that 'well heeled' appearance which then puts them out of th reach of the pocket of most young families of lesser means. Many people commute daily to Bournemouth, Poole, Salisbury and Wimborne or are employed in farm or estate work. There is a small car repair workshop at Marlborough Farm, an agricultural engineer and small garage at Tarrant Hinton.
